channel.title: help
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "help" - i need help

item.title: Re: help
item.content:encoded: thank you all who were able to help me !

item.title: Re: help
item.content:encoded:
Ermâ€¦while I do like to help out where I can, this is something I can't do much for. I don't know the people who run the game, I'm just another user ^^;

What they're saying is probably the best you can do for now: make/use an alternate character to submit a bug report to the people in charge. Suggestions would be to have a short statement at the top stating the problem in a short manner, and below that ( in a seperate paragraph ) give details such as your character name, if this may have happened just after you changed your email/password, when this problem first occured, and other related information.

item.title: Re: help
item.content:encoded: Use your alt and contact McMasters with bug report or try Jadian http://www.wikidot.com/user:info/jadian .

item.title: Re: help
item.content:encoded:
Looks like something is corrupted.

Your picture is missing along with all your stats, the only thing that displays properly is how many missions you have done.

If you can I would submit a bug to McMasters and give him the name of you character, to see what he can do about it.

item.title: help
item.content:encoded:
can someone help me i can't login with my charecter it say's i have a bad password or name but when i lookup my charecter it gives me something weard. if someone can help please do!
my charecters name is wardaddy look him up and you will see what i mean
